meanings.definition: Offensive to accepted standards of decency or modesty.
meanings.sent1: The movie contained obscener scenes that made many viewers uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit was considered obscener than what was appropriate for the formal event.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's obscener jokes had the audience laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The graffiti on the wall was obscener than any art gallery piece.
meanings.sent5: The smell coming from the dumpster was so obscener that it lingered in the air for hours.

meanings.definition: Exceeding the bounds of propriety or good taste.
meanings.sent1: His comments at the meeting were considered obscener than anyone expected.
meanings.sent2: The party took a turn for the obscener once the music got louder.
meanings.sent3: The obscener decorations at the event made it stand out from the rest.
meanings.sent4: The artist's latest painting pushed the boundaries of obscener art.
meanings.sent5: The chef's new dish was so obscener in flavor that it became an instant hit.
